Key Match Events: India won the T20 World Cup for a second time
India recovered from an inauspicious start at 34-3 to finish with an ultimately unassailable 176
Heinrich Klaasen broke the record for the fastest half-century in a T20 World Cup final
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at the Kensington Oval in Barbados
Others: Rohit Sharma of India lifted the ICC Men's T20 Cricket World Cup Trophy
Hardik Pandya, Arshdeep Singh, and Jasprit Bumrah played crucial roles in India's win
Heinrich Klaasen scored 63 runs off 27 balls
Reeza Hendricks and Aiden Markram fell to Bumrah and Arshdeep Singh respectively
Quinton de Kock ran out Axar Patel
Tristan Stubbs provided a much-needed third-wicket stand of 58
David Miller had to go once the catch was confirmed and India closed out the match five balls later
